better.\""},{"lineNumber":176159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「各国の女王。将軍クラスの幹部。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The queens of each country. General-level officers."},{"lineNumber":176160,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス以外に狙いを付ければ、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you had targeted someone other than Rance,"},{"lineNumber":176161,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類はあっという間に敗北したでしょうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"humanity would have been defeated in no time.\""},{"lineNumber":176162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは、っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is...!\""},{"lineNumber":176163,"originalJapaneseLine":"言葉に詰まる元勇者を、","translatedEnglishLine":"The former hero, at a loss for words,"},{"lineNumber":176164,"originalJapaneseLine":"見下すように従者は鼻を鳴らす。","translatedEnglishLine":"was sneered at by his follower."},{"lineNumber":176165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「結局……甘いまま。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the end... you remained soft."},{"lineNumber":176166,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現実逃避の旅は楽しかったですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Did your escape from reality trip bring you any joy?\""},{"lineNumber":176167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「過去も現在も目を背けたかったから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because you wanted to turn your eyes away from both the past and the present,"},{"lineNumber":176168,"originalJapaneseLine":"　未来を見るフリをして……","translatedEnglishLine":"you just pretended to look towards the future..."},{"lineNumber":176169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「起きた災難を、何かのせいにしたかったんでしょ？","translatedEnglishLine":"You wanted to blame something for the disaster that happened, didn't you?"},{"lineNumber":176170,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが、自分自身であっても」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if that something is yourself.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……気のせいならいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... it's fine if it's just my imagination."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうにか、アリオスは身体を起こす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, Arios manages to lift his body up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相当な高さから滑落したらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems he fell from a considerable height.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、強かったですねぇ、ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you were strong, Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ああ。だが、まだ終わらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah. But it's not over yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, ......"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……終わりですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... it's the end."
"...What?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間切れ、ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Time is up, isn't it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エスクードソード、持てます？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can you hold the Escudo Sword?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍らに転がっていた勇者の剣を、掴む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He grabs the hero's sword that was lying beside him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 片手で、自在に操っていたはずの剣が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sword he used to wield freely with one hand...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるっきり、持てない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He can't hold it at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの日……アリオスが勇者に戻った日に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That day... the day Arios returned as the hero,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 触れた感触に、酷似していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The feeling of touching it was strikingly similar.
"No way...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。そのまさかです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. That's exactly it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスの時間遡航も、永遠じゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras's time travel isn't eternal either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな、っ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ、魔王を倒してもいないのに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven't even defeated the Demon King yet...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーあぁ。がっかりですよ、アリオス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haaah. I'm disappointed, Arios.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、勇者には向いてなかったみたいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like you just weren't cut out to be a hero after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コーラは大仰に肩を竦め、やれやれと首を振る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cora dramatically shrugged her shoulders and shook her head with a weary sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ……！　頼む、もう一度……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...! Please, just one more time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの聖女モンスターに会わせてくれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me see that saint monster again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこにいるか知りませんしその気もないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know where she is, and I have no intention either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう無駄ですよ、馬鹿アリオス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's already pointless, foolish Arios."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エスクードソードは回収します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll take back the Escudo Sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう普通の一般人に戻っていいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can just return to being an ordinary civilian now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……っ……！　待ってくれ！
そんな、そんな事、もう、ッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such a thing, no more...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「できるでしょう、別に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can do it, no problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何もしてないじゃないですか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really haven't done anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、助けなかっただけです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You just didn't help."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「直接殺した人間なんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "People you've killed directly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にたかが知れてます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They mean almost nothing, really."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辛辣な物言いにも、返す言葉がなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with such harsh words, he had no words to reply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助けを求める声に背を向け、己を鍛えて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He turned his back on cries for help and trained himself...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、ランスに勝つことはできなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And yet, he couldn't defeat Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けど、っ……なんのために、こんな、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... what was all this for...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理してましたけど、結局は馬鹿のままでしたね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You forced yourself, but in the end, you were still a fool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に合理的な手段は、取らなかったですし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You never took truly rational measures."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たとえばあのランスを避けて、もっと徹底的に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For example, if you had avoided that Rance and more thoroughly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側の有力者を殺して回ったってよかったのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gone around killing the leading figures of humanity, it would have been better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国の女王。将軍クラスの幹部。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The queens of each country. General-level officers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス以外に狙いを付ければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you had targeted someone other than Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類はあっという間に敗北したでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: humanity would have been defeated in no time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言葉に詰まる元勇者を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The former hero, at a loss for words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見下すように従者は鼻を鳴らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was sneered at by his follower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結局……甘いまま。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end... you remained soft.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現実逃避の旅は楽しかったですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did your escape from reality trip bring you any joy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「過去も現在も目を背けたかったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because you wanted to turn your eyes away from both the past and the present,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未来を見るフリをして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you just pretended to look towards the future...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「起きた災難を、何かのせいにしたかったんでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You wanted to blame something for the disaster that happened, didn't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、自分自身であっても」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if that something is yourself."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……気のせいならいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... it's fine if it's just my imagination."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうにか、アリオスは身体を起こす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, Arios manages to lift his body up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相当な高さから滑落したらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems he fell from a considerable height.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、強かったですねぇ、ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you were strong, Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ああ。だが、まだ終わらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah. But it's not over yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, ......"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……終わりですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... it's the end."
"...What?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間切れ、ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Time is up, isn't it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エスクードソード、持てます？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can you hold the Escudo Sword?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍らに転がっていた勇者の剣を、掴む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He grabs the hero's sword that was lying beside him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 片手で、自在に操っていたはずの剣が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sword he used to wield freely with one hand...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるっきり、持てない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He can't hold it at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの日……アリオスが勇者に戻った日に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That day... the day Arios returned as the hero,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 触れた感触に、酷似していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The feeling of touching it was strikingly similar.
"No way...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。そのまさかです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. That's exactly it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスの時間遡航も、永遠じゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras's time travel isn't eternal either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな、っ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ、魔王を倒してもいないのに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven't even defeated the Demon King yet...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーあぁ。がっかりですよ、アリオス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haaah. I'm disappointed, Arios.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、勇者には向いてなかったみたいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like you just weren't cut out to be a hero after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コーラは大仰に肩を竦め、やれやれと首を振る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cora dramatically shrugged her shoulders and shook her head with a weary sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ……！　頼む、もう一度……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...! Please, just one more time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの聖女モンスターに会わせてくれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me see that saint monster again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこにいるか知りませんしその気もないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know where she is, and I have no intention either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう無駄ですよ、馬鹿アリオス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's already pointless, foolish Arios."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エスクードソードは回収します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll take back the Escudo Sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう普通の一般人に戻っていいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can just return to being an ordinary civilian now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……っ……！　待ってくれ！
そんな、そんな事、もう、ッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such a thing, no more...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「できるでしょう、別に。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can do it, no problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何もしてないじゃないですか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really haven't done anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、助けなかっただけです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You just didn't help."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「直接殺した人間なんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "People you've killed directly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にたかが知れてます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They mean almost nothing, really."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辛辣な物言いにも、返す言葉がなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with such harsh words, he had no words to reply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助けを求める声に背を向け、己を鍛えて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He turned his back on cries for help and trained himself...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、ランスに勝つことはできなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And yet, he couldn't defeat Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けど、っ……なんのために、こんな、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... what was all this for...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理してましたけど、結局は馬鹿のままでしたね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You forced yourself, but in the end, you were still a fool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に合理的な手段は、取らなかったですし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You never took truly rational measures."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たとえばあのランスを避けて、もっと徹底的に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For example, if you had avoided that Rance and more thoroughly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側の有力者を殺して回ったってよかったのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gone around killing the leading figures of humanity, it would have been better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国の女王。将軍クラスの幹部。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The queens of each country. General-level officers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス以外に狙いを付ければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you had targeted someone other than Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類はあっという間に敗北したでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: humanity would have been defeated in no time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言葉に詰まる元勇者を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The former hero, at a loss for words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見下すように従者は鼻を鳴らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was sneered at by his follower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結局……甘いまま。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end... you remained soft.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現実逃避の旅は楽しかったですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did your escape from reality trip bring you any joy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「過去も現在も目を背けたかったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because you wanted to turn your eyes away from both the past and the present,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未来を見るフリをして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you just pretended to look towards the future...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「起きた災難を、何かのせいにしたかったんでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You wanted to blame something for the disaster that happened, didn't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、自分自身であっても」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if that something is yourself."
